attributes.action: Jacobean English Cultural Scolarship scheme for national curriculm
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this e petition is to get government to introduce Jacobean English Cultural Scolarship scheme into Secondary schools and Primary schools to reconnect English children into the great English legacy of our 17TH Century heritage by introducing them to  Famous English poets of the age and composers
Poets
John Donne
Ben Jonson
Abraham Cowley
Richard Cradham    william Byrd Thomas Lups
